text:
ONSITE Email Analyst Holiday Inn Club Vacations Orlando Florida We are a growing resort company with 28 resorts strong and looking to acquire more resorts throughout the US, This position is to work for the rental side of the business were you will be focused on heads in beds. We have about 700 - 800 leads a month we are needing to convert and create drip campaigns for.

Interested?

Read more on position:https://jobs.holidayinnclub.com/job/kissimmee/email-marketin... Apply by sending your resume to ejones@holidayinnclub.com
